statements: SELECT * FROM customer_insights;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_insights ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, purchase_amount FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND customer_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_location LIKE '%New York%' OR customer_location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_insights WHERE customer_age >= 18 AND customer_gender = 'Other';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT location, age FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_level FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND location='New York' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY location, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE LOWER(trend_name) LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_level FROM MarketTrends WHERE LENGTH(trend_description) > 30 ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY trend_id DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY metric_name
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT trend_name, trend_type FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_type, trend_value FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'industry' ORDER BY trend_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_type = 'revenue';
SELECT insight_title, insight_date FROM ReportInsights WHERE insight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, value, metric_date FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT insight_title, insight_description FROM ReportInsights WHERE LENGTH(insight_description) > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, start_date, end_date FROM BusinessStrategies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
